name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Jeffrey MADDOX, Appellee

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON and ZAPPALA and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Jeffrey MADDOX, Appellee.

opinions.text:
PER CURIAM.
This appeal is dismissed as having been improvidently granted.

attorneys: Robert E. Colville, Dist. Atty., Robert L. Eberhardt, Deputy Dist. Atty., Kenneth J. Benson, Asst. Dist. Atty., Pittsburgh, for appellant.
casebody.head_matter:
525 A.2d 1204
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Jeffrey MADDOX, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted March 9, 1987.
Decided May 27, 1987.
Robert E. Colville, Dist. Atty., Robert L. Eberhardt, Deputy Dist. Atty., Kenneth J. Benson, Asst. Dist. Atty., Pittsburgh, for appellant.
Jeffrey Maddox, pro se.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON and ZAPPALA and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
